summary: In November 1939, Georg Elser's attempt to assassinate Adolf Hitler fails, and he is arrested. During his confinement, he recalls the events leading up to his plot and his reasons for deciding to take such drastic action.
cast: Christian Friedel|Katharina Schüttler|Burghart Klaußner|Johann von Bülow|Felix Eitner|David Zimmerschied|Rüdiger Klink|Simon Licht|Cornelia Köndgen|Martin Maria Abram|Michael Kranz|Gerti Drassl|Lissy Pernthaler|Valentina Repetto|Anna Unterberger|Manfred-Anton Algrang|Michael Ehnert|Udo Schenk|Thomas Gräßle|Anna Holmes|Sebastian Fritz|Christian Koch|Oliver Bigalke|Dennis Hofmeister|Emil von Schönfels|Emilia Pieske|Nike Seitz|Frederik Bott|Thomas M. Meinhardt|Georg Alfred Wittner|Christian Pätzold|Peter Becker|Meik Engelmann|Markus Ertelt|Benedikt Kauff|Uwe Pasora|Philipp Makolies|Christian Grochau|Alessandro Fabris|David Lucas Craffonara|Eva Rothmaler|Giacomo Lorenzi|Michael von Hohenberg|Adolf Hitler|Franco Moscon|Annika Strauss
title: 13 minutos para matar a Hitler
